snippet: Organizers of next year’s Rio de Janeiro Olympics promised to begin testing for viruses in the polluted waters where athletes will compete in sailing, rowing and triathlon events.
abstract: Olympic Games organizers will begin testing for viruses in polluted waters of Rio de Janeiro, where athletes are scheduled to compete in sailing, rowing and triathlon events in 2016; other Olympics-related news noted.
lead_paragraph: Organizers of next year’s Rio de Janeiro Olympics promised to begin testing for viruses in the polluted waters where athletes will compete in sailing, rowing and triathlon events.

headline.main: Rio to Test Olympic Waters for Viruses
headline.print_headline: Rio to Test Water for Viruses
